article_title: Kelly Clarkson’s New Song Featuring Her Baby’s Prenatal Heartbeat Debuts as Two Heartbeat Cases Are Heard in Court
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: On Monday, new mom and pop/country superstar Kelly Clarkson released “Heartbeat Song”—an upbeat, synth-driven single that celebrates her new baby girl.
